definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

pinyin: Ke3 kou3 Ke3 le4 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: The coco-cola frothed as it was poured out.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂倒出來時泛起泡沫。

sentences.english: Goizueta said Coke needed a larger share of that market.
sentences.chinese: 古茲維塔說，可口可樂需要在那塊市場做大佔有率。

sentences.english: Coca Cola can be used to cure Jellyfish stings.
sentences.chinese: 被水母蟄傷也可以用可口可樂來治療。

sentences.english: To share credit information of credit customer with bottler.
sentences.chinese: 與太古可口可樂各個裝瓶廠分享信用客戶信用信息。

sentences.english: I Didn’t know that Coca Cola can be used to cure Jellyfish stings.
sentences.chinese: 被水母蟄傷也可以用可口可樂來治療哦。

sentences.english: Coca Cola is an excellent rust buster.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂是鐵鏽的“天敵”。

sentences.english: Eat up high-caloric food and can't give up coke-cola.
sentences.chinese: 喫高熱量的夜宵離不開可口可樂。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Coca-Cola is trying to get hipper without the help of any celebrities.
sentences.chinese: 同時，可口可樂正在嘗試不借助名人的效應趕上時代。

sentences.english: And Coca-Cola managed to make itself one of the most widely distributed products of wartime.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂更力爭上游，成爲戰時最暢銷產品之一。

sentences.english: Or, if he’s a teetotaler, a bottle of Tasty Fun.
sentences.chinese: 若是不喝酒，那就來瓶“可口可樂”。

sentences.english: Coca-Cola's Minute Maid brand plays in the less expensive, larger segment of the market.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂的美汁源則價格更便宜，所佔分額也更大。

sentences.english: I'll have a small fries and a large Coke.
sentences.chinese: 我要一分小暑條和一大杯可口可樂。

sentences.english: Popcorn and cokes beneath the stars became champagne and caviar.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂和爆米花賽過香檳和魚子醬。

sentences.english: Kodak, Coca-cola, Orlon and Dacron are examples of coined words.
sentences.chinese: 柯達，可口可樂，奧綸和滌綸的例子造詞。

sentences.english: Hands Yang Dahai a Coca Cola cans.
sentences.chinese: 遞給了楊大海一罐可口可樂。

sentences.english: Coca-Cola made by a patented formula offers you a unique and unforgettable taste.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂，專利配方，獨特口味，令君難忘。
